channel.title: C Programming on Joshua Taylor
channel.description: Recent content in C Programming on Joshua Taylor

item.title: Making a Game for DOS
item.description: When I was a kid in the 90s, my parents refused me a Super Nintendo. They were of the firm belief that video games rot your brain, and maybe they were somewhat right. Either way, all my friends had one, and I was one envious little child. (I was pretty whiny about it too.) However, my sister convinced my parents to buy a PC instead, and in retrospect, Iâ€™m glad I never got that Super Nintendo.
